imdb.title: Kenran budôsai: Za mâzu deibureiku
imdb.plot: Mars is now almost covered by ocean. Many have chosen the pirate's life, but the crew of the Aurora catches the eye of the ruling Earth Government. Animation by studio BONES. Music by Kaoru Wada.

episodes.title: Ferocious Attack! Round Buckler!
episodes.plot: Gram becomes crew member of the Aurora. But because of his carelessness, the Aurora is attacked by Round Bucklers.

episodes.title: Junior's Deployment Dream Fulfilled!
episodes.plot: Junior takes an RB out without permission and is caught by the Earth Forces. Vess begs Gram to leave the pirate's life.

episodes.title: Contact! Gram and Vess and a Submarine
episodes.plot: The Aurora is being repaired before departure. Gram goes to town to make his farewells but he comes across Vess again.

episodes.title: Anna's Struggle! the Fleet of Our Dreams
episodes.plot: The granddaughter of Earth's president Enora has been kidnapped. The Aurora starts to be hunted down for it by error.

episodes.title: Alas! O Revolution of Glory and Passion?!
episodes.plot: The crew has to capture the hit-and-run ship that damaged the Aurora. But hidden weapons are found during the chase.

episodes.title: Friend or Foe?! the Mercenary Pirate
episodes.plot: Gram is saved by a man with an artificial arm who claims to be an acquaintance of Elizabeth, the Captain of the Aurora.

episodes.title: Dazzling! Extravagant Ball
episodes.plot: The Aurora crew boards on a luxury ship of Earth nationality where Martian laws do not apply. Enemies happen to gather.

episodes.title: Gulp! a Bath Full of Swimsuits
episodes.plot: The Aurora has to face a giant creature. Gram attempts to fight it with his RB, to prevent the Aurora from sinking.

episodes.title: Sightsee! the Romance of the Mars Aborigines
episodes.plot: Gram helps an old woman but this drags him into an unexpected situation. What's the real purpose of the old woman?

episodes.title: Breakthrough! the Earth Forces' Dragnet
episodes.plot: The Earth Forces have tracked down the Aurora that manages to escape anyway. But Vess finds a way to trace them.

episodes.title: Mysterious! Ghost Ship Drift Zone
episodes.plot: A ship of unknown origin is detected. Then weird things start to happen in the Aurora. Is this due to a Ghost Pirate?

episodes.title: Fearless! the Bride at the Bottom of the Sea
episodes.plot: The Aurora saves a woman in a wedding dress, who is after her fiance. She mistakes one of the crew as her loved one.

episodes.title: The Great Escape! at the Limits of Love and Passion
episodes.plot: Vess deserts the flagship and comes to defy Gram, but she has hard times. Then Gram's RB gets immobilized by chance.

episodes.title: The Enemy Below! Run Silent, Run Deep
episodes.plot: Vess is still after the Aurora but she is attacked by pirates. Will she be able to get out of this difficult situation?

episodes.title: Mutiny! the Greatest Pirate in the Universe
episodes.plot: Yagami revolts against Elizabeth on the Box of Guidance and occupies the Aurora. Enora undertakes the Captain's rescue.

episodes.title: Fly, Vector of Hope! Cross That Gate!
episodes.plot: As Gram tries to break through a strategic point of the Earth Forces, an unknown RB appears that runs alongside him.

episodes.title: Fight to the Death! Gram and Vess
episodes.plot: Vess sends a letter of challenge to Gram. When the two face each other, fate makes the duel take an unexpected turn.

episodes.title: Farewell, My Friend! a Man's Dreams Never Die!
episodes.plot: Junior is appointed as a diver at last, for the new RB. Meanwhile, Yagami decides to go back to his original mission.

episodes.title: Discovery! Holy Place of the Olympus Treasure Legend
episodes.plot: Elizabeth makes plans to defeat Earth Forces and Kubernes and enables the Aurora to reach the cavern of the treasure.

episodes.title: The Godstone! Struggle for a Place No One Has Gone Before
episodes.plot: The Aurora makes its way to the cavern thanks to the Daybreak Attack. The owner of the Aurora surprisingly appears.

episodes.title: Earth Forces Assault! Operation to Board the Ship of Aurora
episodes.plot: At the exit of the cavern, the Earth Forces ambush the Aurora, that has to surrender. But Gram won't accept it.

episodes.title: Run Hard, Gram! Save Your Imprisoned Friends
episodes.plot: Vess and Enora manage to come back to Mars. With Gram, they start the operations to rescue the Aurora crew.

episodes.title: Dawn Comes to Mars! Mars Daybreak
episodes.plot: The Aurora crew is rescued with the help of Vess, Yagami and a third ally. Captain Elizabeth is burning with anger.
